mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (userName, title, content, regDate) VALUES(#{userName}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT seq, userName, title, content, regDate FROM board ORDER BY seq desc LIMIT #{startPage}, #{size}
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE deleteYN = 0
SELECT seq, userName, title, content, regDate FROM board WHERE seq = #{no} and deleteYN = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET userName = #{userName}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modDate = now() WHERE seq = #{no}
